title: Is it normal for the monthly security update to take my battery from 100% to 92% in the 15 seconds?
content: Just ran the Dec security update this morning immediately after taking my phone from the charger.  It restarted in 15 seconds and the battery level went from 100% to 92%.  Have never had this happen (though I swear each security update diminishes my battery life noticeably) - anybody else?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
